text.section:
A person may not:
sell or possess a stolen:
manufactured serial number; or
vehicle identification plate or label; or
possess a manufactured serial number or vehicle identification plate or label if the person intends it to be:
affixed to stolen property; or
used for fraudulent purposes.

A person who violates a provision of this section is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to imprisonment not exceeding 18 months or a fine not exceeding $500 or both for each violation.
